Blog.post: "Leave it to the Catholics to destroy existence." Salma Hayek como Serendipity

"Check this shit. You got cracker farm boy Luke Skywalker, Nazi poster boy, blond hair, blue eyes. And then you got Darth Vader, the blackest brother in the galaxy, Nubian god!" Dwight Ewell como Hooper
"I always thought it'd be better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody." Matt Damon como Tom Ripley
"When you have to shoot, shoot, don't talk." Eli Wallach como Tuco (The Ugly)
"If you want a vision of the future, Winston, imagine a boot stamping on a human face forever." Richard Burton como O'Brien
"I think people need each other, they're made that way. But they haven't learnt how to live together." Margit Carstensen como Petra von Kant
"A football is round, a game lasts 90 minutes. That's for sure. Anything else is merely hypothetical. Off we go!" Armin Rohde como Herr Schuster
"Time destroys everything." Philippe Nahon como Philippe
"I don't know if my wife left me because of my drinking or I started drinking 'cause my wife left me." Nicolas Cage como Ben Sanderson
"Even Hell has its heroes, señor." Jose Lopez Rodero como los hermanos Ceniza
"Well, at least I have potential. It's a wonderful thing, potential. Because as long as I don't do anything, I'll still have it." Penelope Ann Miller como Rebecca
"Man is born crying. When he has cried enough, he dies." Peter como Kyoami
" Frank Bannister: You are SUCH an asshole. Milton Dammers: I'm an asshole... with an Uzi!" Michael J Fox como Frank Bannister Jeffrey Combs como Milton Dammers
"Initiative comes to thems that wait." Malcolm McDowell como Alex
"I just find I relate better to people when they're not actually there" Al Pacino como Viktor Taransky (Simone)
"A man can convince anyone he's somebody else, but never himself" Kevin Spacey como Verbal
"Being a fool for a woman like you... is always the right thing to do." Michael Parks como Esteban Vihaio
"Those of you lucky enough to have your lives take them with you. However, leave the limbs you've lost. They belong to me now." Uma Thurman como The Bride
"This is the LAPD. We're the most hated cops in all the free world. My own mama's ashamed of me. She tells everybody I'm a drug dealer." Chris Tucker como James Carter
" Walt : I thought you were afraid of heights. Travis : I'm not afraid of heights. I'm afraid of fallin'." Dean Stockwell como Walt Harry Dean Stanton como Travis
"It was kinda fun in a necrophile sort of way." John Cassavetes como Guy Woodhouse

" Ted: Free will is obviously not a big factor in this little world of ours. Allegra: It's like real life. There's just enough to make it interesting. " Jude Law como Ted Jennifer Jason Leigh como Allegra
"I say what I mean, and I do what I say". Al Pacino como Vincent Hanna
"I make a lot of mistakes, but so does God" Anthony Hopkins como Pablo Picasso
"A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice chianti." Anthony Hopkins como Hannibal Lecter
"I chose to believe in the basic goodness of people. Some basically good people do some very bad things." Richard Gere como Marty
"Remember: Your foucus determines your reality" Liam Neeson como Qui-Gon Jinn
"Talking about love is like dancing about architecture." Angelina Jolie como Joan
“Look at her body language – all verbs” Jason Biggs como Jerry Falk (Gracias Corso)
“The Pentagon should be using her hormones for chemical warfare” Woody Allen como David Dobel (Gracias Corso)
"Are you seeing planes? Is your name Tattoo? Because swear to God, you're living on Fantasy Island" Chris Kattan como Doug Butabi
"Fortunately, I'm adhering to a pretty strict, uh, drug, uh, regimen to keep my mind, you know, uh, limber." Jeff Bridges como The Dude
"Meet you in Malkovich in one hour." Catherine Keener como Maxine
"(sneezes) ...Sorry, I'm allergic to bullshit." Will Smith como Detective Del Spooner
"If you think that Mick Jagger will still be doing the whole rock star thing at age fifty, well, then, you are sorely, sorely mistaken." Jimmy Fallon como Dennis Hope
"Why is it that a woman walks in a room with great tits, every other woman in the joint says that she's a slut? Why is that?" Barry Pepper como Frank Slaughtery
"You are everything I never knew I always wanted." Matthew Perry como Alex Whitman
"I am the walrus god is just the middle man." Peter Stormare como Dixie
"The truth is the explanation that most people want to buy." Harris Yulin como Stanley Goldkiss
"Listen, here's the thing. If you can't spot the sucker in the first half hour at the table, then you ARE the sucker." Matt Damon como Mike McDermott
"My name is a killing word." Kyle MacLachlan como Paul
"The tragedy of your time, my young friends, is that you may get exactly what you want." Charles Macaulay como el Inspector Shrink
"In the name of the father, the son and the holy toast." Joe Breen como Frank (joven)

"Whatever became of the moment when one first knew about death? There must have been one. A moment. In childhood. When it first occured to you that you don't go on forever. It must have been shattering, stamped into one's memory. And yet, I can't remember it." Gary Oldman como Rosencratz
"I have crossed oceans of time to find you." Gary Oldman como Dracula

"Love is a mindfield, you take a step and get blown to pieces, put yourself back together again and stupidly take another step. I guess thats human nature, it hurts so much to be alone that we'd all rather blow-up than be single." Famke Janssen como Kate
" Xenia Onatopp: You don't need the gun. James Bond: Well, that depends on your definition of safe sex." Famke Janssen como Xenia Onatopp Pierce Brosnan como James Bond
"Never trust anything that bleeds for five days and doesn't die." Michael Rooker como Keith
"Sad to have a dream you know won't happen." Jude Law como Vassili
"When I was going up the stairs, I met a man who wasn't there. He wasn't there again today, I wish, I wish he'd go away..." John Cusack como Ed
"Whatever drama you've gotten yourself into, it's just the kind of thing that always happens to you. And it never happens to me unless I am in your field of gravity." Kim Staunton como Valerie Gipson
"My ass may be dumb, but I ain't no dumbass." Samuel L. Jackson como Ordell Robbie
"Dying's a really hard way to learn about life." Michael Keaton como Bob Jones
"I don't smoke, I don't drink and I don't swear. Oh shit. I DO smoke and drink." Tom Amandes como Hal
"Life is just a dream on the way to death." Mia Kirshner como Sarah
"All women have the same color when the candle is out." Mark Dacascos como Mani
"Judas kept excellent company." Charles Berling como Gregoire Ponceludon de Malavoy
"A boy's best friend is his mother." Anthony Perkins como Norman Bates
"In the quiet words of the Virgin Mary... come again." Alan Ford como Brick Top
"You're dumber than you think I think you are." Jack Nicholson como Jake Gittes
" Kevin Lomax: What are you? John Milton: Oh, I have so many names... Kevin Lomax: Satan. John Milton: Call me Dad" Keanu Reeves como Kevin Lomax Al Pacino como John Milton
"It's lonely being a cannibal. Tough making friends." Jeffrey Jones como Colonel Hart
"I can't remember to forget you." Guy Pearce como Leonard Shelby
"Now I know how GOD felt when he created the Earth: very glad he had taken his valium!" Michael Caine como Lloyd Fellowes

"It is a good viewpoint to see the world as a dream. When you have something like a nightmare, you will wake up and tell yourself that it was only a dream. It is said that the world we live in is not a bit different from this." Forest Whitaker como Ghost Dog
"That gun will replace your tongue. You will learn to speak through it. And your poetry will be written in blood." Gary Farmer como Nobody
"This is life's ultimate cruelty. It offers us a taste of youth and vitality, and then it makes us witness our own decay." Isabella Rossellini como Lisle Von Rhuman
"I'd rather imagine a man than know him for sure." Kathleen Turner como Alberta Trager
"You cannot find peace by avoiding life, Leonard." Nicole Kidman como Virginia Woolf
"It's like a plumber: if you do it OK, nobody notices, if you fuck up, it gets full of shit." Dustin Hoffman como Stanley Motss
"In Sicily, women are more dangerous than shotguns." Angelo Infanti como Fabrizio
"I'm flesh and blood, but not human. I haven't been human for two hundred years." Brad Pitt como Louie
"Can we please have an erection? What the hell is going on down there?" Tony Randall como The Operator
"To me, the only reality is imagination; the world inside myself. The revolution no longer interests me." Patrick Magee como Sade

"11:15, restate my assumptions: 1. Mathematics is the language of nature. 2. Everything around us can be represented and understood through numbers. 3. If you graph these numbers, patterns emerge. Therefore: There are patterns everywhere in nature." Sean Gullette como Maximillian Cohen
"The Torah is just a long string of numbers. Some say that it's a code sent to us from God." Ben Shenkman como Lenny Meyer
"Can I dream now?" Carrie Henn como Newt
"How can you trust a man who wears both a belt and suspenders? The man can't even trust his own pants." Henry Fonda como Frank
"I believe there's a hero in all of us. Gives us strength, makes us noble. Even though sometimes, we have to give up the thing we want the most." Rosemary Harris como May Parker
"The one thing they love more than a hero is to see a hero fail." Willem Dafoe como Green Goblin

"Why, why, why? Because it's all logic and reason now! Science, progress, chip-chip... Laws of hydraulics, laws of social dynamics, laws of this, that and the other... No place for three legged Cyclops in the South Seas... no place for cucumber trees and oceans of vine... no place for me!" John Neville como el Baron Munchausen

"What sick ridiculous puppets we are / and what gross little stage we dance on / What fun we have dancing and fucking / Not a care in the world / Not knowing that we are nothing / We are not what was intended." Kevin Spacey como John Doe
"I'm really a nice guy. If I had friends you could ask them" Eugene Levy como Walter Kornbluth

" Huggy Bear: I believe it was said: "To err is human, to forgive is divine." Hutch: Ha! What idiot said that? Huggy Bear: I believe it was God - the greatest mack of all" Owen Wilson como Hutch Snoop Dogg como Huggy Bear
"The Internet is a communication tool used the world over where people can come together to bitch about movies and share pornography with one another." Ben Affleck como Holden

" Mantke Clerk: Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth, so help yo God? Larry Flynt: No. Judge Thomas Alva Mantke: No? Larry Flynt: Your honor, I'm an atheist. I can't very well, uh, swear to a God I don't believe exists." Mary Neal Naylor como Mantke Clerk Woody Harrelson como Larry Flynt D'Army Bailey como Judge Thomas Alva Mantke
"So, you want to know what the best lay I ever had? Right. That's easy, it's me. Nobody gives me more pleasure than I give myself" Aaron Eckhart como Barry

"I was just thinking what an interesting concept it is to eliminate the writer from the artistic process. If we could just get rid of these actors and directors, maybe we've got something here." Tim Robbins como Griffin Mill
"Ray. When someone asks you if you're a god, you say yes" Ernie Hudson como Winston Zeddemore
"Me and my wife are dependent on each other. It is out of selfish reasons we haven't beaten each other to death a long time ago." Gunnar Sjöberg como Sten Alman
"The car crash is a fertilizing rather than a destructive event." Elias Koteas como Vaughan
"Now you're thinking, just now "Why me, O God?". The answer is, God has nothing to do with it. In fact, God is never in France this time of year." Michael Wincott como Dorleac
"Anybody who tells you money is the root of all evil doesn't fucking have any." Ben Affleck como Jim Young
"Mmm... nachos" Ron Pearlman como Hellboy
"If you hang onto the past you die a little each day" Juliette Lewis como Daniel
"The simple plan is, no one in this room is going to have sex with anyone else in this room. We'll be platonic... like our parents." Eszter Balint como Vivian
" Lazlo: Your wife is in a safe... Oz: My wife is in a safe? Lazlo: Place. Safe place. Let me finish the sentence!" Matthew Perry como Oz Kevin Pollak como Lazlo
"At least you'll never be a vegetable - even artichokes have hearts." Audrey Tautou como Amélie Poulain
"Hey, you know what's scarier than not believing in God? Believing in him. I mean, really believing in him. It's a fucking terrifying thought" como Frankie Paige
"Clothes maketh the man; and the less there is of the man, the more the need of the clothes." John Neville como Terrence

"A man can be an artist in anything. Food... wine... it depends on how good he is at it. Creasey's art is death, and he's about to paint his masterpiece. Stay out of his way." Christopher Walken como Rayburn
"Forgiveness is between them and God. It's my job to arrange the meeting" Denzel Washington como Creasy
"Why Don't We Do It In The Road. Fuckin' hell kind of era is that?" Dudley Moore como George Webber
"Romance is great, but I just want to remind you, it don't pay the bills. " Mike McGlone como Francis Fitzpatrick
"I love America. No one is responsible for what they do." Karel Roden como Emil Slovak
"He who hesitates, masturbates." Jim Carrey como Chip Douglas (Cable Guy)
"Constantly talking isn't necessarily communicating." Jim Carrey como Joel Barish

"If there's any kind of magic in this world, it must be in the attempt of understanding someone, sharing something. I know, it's almost impossible to succeed, but... who cares, really? The answer must be in the attempt." Julie Delpy como Celine
"And since I am dead, I can take off my head, to recite Shakespearean quotations." Chris Sarandon como Jack Skellington
"Sometimes it hits you how quickly the present fades into the past, and you question everything around you. You wonder if anything you'd ever do would matter." Toni Collette como Iris Chapman

"You know what the problem with Hollywood is? They make shit. Unbelievable, unremarkable shit. Now I'm not some grungy wannabe filmmaker that's searching for existentialism through a haze of bong smoke or something. No, it's easy to pick apart bad acting, short-sighted directing, and a purely moronic stringing together of words that many of the studios term as "prose". " John Travolta como Gabriel
"Logic is overrated." Halle Berry como Miranda
"Your heart is free. Have the courage to follow it." Sean Lawlor como Malcolm Wallace
"Ohana means family, family means nobody gets left behind. Or forgotten." Daveigh Chase como Lilo (Gracias Beauty Queen from Mars)
"I'm in love with you, you don't have to love me back, I'm gonna give you my heart." Marisa Tomei como Caroline ( Gracias Beauty Queen from Mars)
"I'm not against technology, doctor. I'm against the men who deify it at the expense of human truth." Matthew McConaughey como Palmer Joss
"It's disgusting how much I love you." Jodie Foster como Meg
